alert.note: Alert for Charles City; James City; King William; King and Queen; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:56PM EDT until July 26 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KING AND QUEEN...EAST CENTRAL CHARLES CITY...EASTERN NEW KENT...SOUTHEASTERN KING WILLIAM AND NORTHWESTERN JAMES CITY COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Kent, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Barhamsville and Holdcroft around 405 PM EDT. Toano around 415 PM EDT. Norge around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Holly Forks, Eltham, Chickahominy Shore, Croaker, Cohoke, Gressit, Lanexa, Centerville, Mattaponi and Warren Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; James City; King William; King and Queen; New Kent
